nodes.text: This Jedi book was located in the Hall of Knowledge of Great Jedi Library on the planet Ossus. It was written in the ancient classical Ossan language. It described Force abilities, including battle meditation.

This book was discovered by Luke Skywalker and Jem Ysanna in the subterranean ruins of Great Jedi Library on Ossus in 10 ABY. In 11 ABY on the course to the planet Onderon, Leia Organa Solo learned ancient art of the battle meditation.
